string-array.name: get_all_notebooks
string-array.item: GET: Get list of all notebooks
Queries for all notebooks in OneNote and returns a list

string-array.name: get_notebooks_expand
string-array.item: GET: Get notebooks and sections using $expand

This is one example to demonstrate how the $expand query parameter can be used to return all notebooks and their descendant sections, sectionGroups in one roundtrip. In this case we are going to make a GET request on ~/notebooks?$expand=sections,sectionGroups($expand=sections)

string-array.name: get_notebook_by_id
string-array.item: GET: Get a specific notebook by id
Query for a list of all notebooks with a given id. This example shows how to use the

string-array.name: notebook_specific_meta
string-array.item: GET: Get metadata of a specific notebook
Following the previous example, first we get a list of all notebooks and then query the metadata for one of the selected notebooks. Please select a specific notebook from the drop-down below

string-array.name: notebook_specific_name
string-array.item: GET: Get notebooks with a specific name

Query for a list of all notebooks with a given name. This example shows how to use the \'$filter=name eq \'<term>\' query parameter. Please enter the case-sensitive full notebook name to look for in the TextBox below

string-array.name: notebook_selected_meta
string-array.item: GET: Get sorted list of notebooks with selected metadata

Get a sorted list of notebooks using the $orderBy=name asc query parameter and only specific metadata in the response using the $select=id,name query parameter. $orderBy can be used to specify your custom sort order

string-array.name: get_notebooks_shared_by_others
string-array.item: GET: Get notebooks shared by others

Query for a list of all notebooks where the current user is not an Owner (i.e. the notebooks are owned by someone else and were shared with the current user with either a Reader or Contributor access level). This example shows how to use the \'$filter=userRole ne Microsoft.OneNote.Api.UserRole\'Owner\'\' query parameter and will return non-zero results only if the current user has access to shared notebooks

string-array.name: create_new_notebook
string-array.item: Create a new blank notebook. Please enter the new notebook\'s name in the TextBox below
